attributes.action: release the information about who authorises the e-petitions on the number10 website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we beleive they get paid too much for doing too little.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
